Name: Koko Colada
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: A ridiculously simple, three-equal-parts party cocktail, shaken to produce a pineapple and coconut cocktail fortified with rum and crowned with a foamy head. Off-dry and fruity rather than sweet.
History: Adapted from a recipe promoted by Koko Kanu in 2017 consisting of just equal parts liqueur and pineapple juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Koko Colada contains 181 calories
